sentences.en: But, also can give you incommode sometimes, produce plastic shoe dermatitis.
sentences.cn: 但是, 有时也会给您添麻烦, 发生塑料鞋皮炎.

sentences.en: We do not ask others to be faultless , we only ask their faults should not incommode to our own .
sentences.cn: 我们不要求他人完美无缺，我们只要求他们的缺陷不会妨碍我们。

sentences.en: Will it incommode you if I use your computer for a while?
sentences.cn: 我借你的电脑用一下会使你不方便 吗 ?
